title: Mohsin Naqvi praises security forces for eliminating 34 Indian-sponsored terrorists in KP
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 16 (APP): Federal Interior Minister Mohsin Naqvi has lauded Pakistan’s security forces for conducting successful operations against Indian-sponsored terrorists in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, commending their courage, professionalism and dedication to national security.
In a statement issued on Wednesday, the federal minister praised the forces for eliminating 34 Indian-backed terrorists, saying the achievement reflects the exceptional operational capabilities and unwavering resolve of Pakistan’s armed and security institutions.
“I pay rich tribute to our brave security forces for sending 34 Indian-sponsored terrorists to hell,” Naqvi stated, adding that Pakistan’s valiant officers and soldiers were the nation’s pride.
The interior minister emphasized that the country’s fearless sons thwarted the nefarious designs of the terrorists through timely and effective operations, preventing potential large-scale attacks and saving countless innocent lives.
He further said that the nation holds the efforts of the security forces in the highest regard, recognizing their sacrifices and relentless commitment to establishing lasting peace in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa.
“Our professional security forces have achieved remarkable successes in the war against terrorism,” Naqvi remarked. “We will completely eradicate all Indian-sponsored terrorist elements from every corner of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa.”
The interior minister reaffirmed the government’s determination to defend Pakistan’s sovereignty at all costs and to continue supporting security agencies in their mission to ensure peace and stability across the region.
